meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year classes and my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Kimberly, a first-year English major. I’ve taken two difficult classes so far and feel like I’m falling behind. I’m still in the learning process, but I’m worried I’ll fail my major and feel like I’m not cut out for college. I’m also dealing with anxiety around school and personal goals. I’d like some support dealing with these emotions and figuring out how to thrive in this major.
